Description: Informal groups of co-residents, social groups, age-based groups, or performance groups
Groups based on kin relationships, such as lineages, phratries, and clans
Subsistence groups, market groups, and other groups with primarily economic goals
All groups related to inter-group conflict
Groups formed for spiritual or supernatural purpose
Political groups at the level of the community, i.e., political leaders, such as village headmen, can potentially interact directly with most community members
Political groups that encompass multiple residential communities, such as complex chiefdoms, regional political leaders, and kings or state-level leaders
